sentences.en: Uber-babe Jenny McCarthy has hinted at the trials young actresses must undergo in Hollywood's seedier realms.
sentences.cn: 超级宝贝简妮麦卡锡暗示说年轻女演员们在成名前必须忍受好莱坞不那么光鲜的一面。

sentences.en: These act like batteries when they undergo a temperature change: attach electrodes to them and they generate a current.
sentences.cn: 它们经历温度变化时会像电池一样工作：给它们接上电极，它们就会产生电流。

sentences.en: Fans may undergo body searches by security guards.
sentences.cn: 仰慕者们可能要接受保安人员的搜身。
